T07TD4089E:8a-26: gong ma gsum gyi bsam gtan ni //
T07TD4089E:8a-28: rang la dmigs brgyad gzugs med pa //
T07TD4089E:8a-29: gnyis kyi'o bsam gtan gnyis na drug / drug gi 'dod pa'o rang ni bzhi'i //
T07TD4089E:8a-30: gong ma gcig gi dmigs pa yin //
T07TD4089E:8a-31: gzugs med nye bar bsdogs na bzhi //
T07TD4089E:8a-32: gzugs 'gro gong mar 'gro ba gcig / dngos gzhi na gcig rang yul can //
T07TD4089E:8a-33: bco brgyad thams cad zag dang bcas //
T07TD4089E:8a-35: 'dir ni nyon mongs sa bon bzhin //
T07TD4089E:8a-36: klu bzhin rtsva bzhin ljon shing bzhin //
T07TD4089E:8a-37: de bzhin shun pa bzhin du 'dod //
T07TD4089E:8a-39: de bzhin sman dang me tog bzhin //
T07TD4089E:8a-40: gzhi ni bza' btung grub pa bzhin //
T07TD4089E:8a-41: srid pa bzhi po de dag las //
T07TD4089E:8a-42: skye ba'i srid pa nyon mongs can //
T07TD4089E:8a-43: rang gi sa pa'i nyon mongs kun //
T07TD4089E:8a-44: gzhan rnam gsum po gzugs med gsum //
T07TD4089E:8a-45: 'gro ba zas kyis gnas pa yin //
T07TD4089E:8a-46: kham gyi zas ni 'dod pa na //
T07TD4089E:8b-0: skye mched gsum @8b gyi bdag nyid do //
T07TD4089E:8b-1: gzugs kyi skye mched ma yin des //
T07TD4089E:8b-2: rang dbang grol la mi phan phyir //
T07TD4089E:8b-3: reg dang sems pa rnam shes ni //
T07TD4089E:8b-4: zag bcas zas yin gsum dag na //
T07TD4089E:8b-5: yid las byung dang srid tshol dang //
T07TD4089E:8b-6: dri za srid pa bar ma dang //
T07TD4089E:8b-8: rten pa rgyas pa'i don du gnyis //
T07TD4089E:8b-10: don du gnyis te go rims bzhin //
T07TD4089E:8b-13: yid kyi rnam shes kho nar 'dod //
T07TD4089E:8b-15: rtse gcig sems med la de med //
T07TD4089E:8b-16: mya ngan 'da' lung bstan min gnyis //
T07TD4089E:8b-18: rim gyis 'chi na rkang pa dang //
T07TD4089E:8b-20: gnad gcod pa ni chu sogs kyis //
T07TD4089E:8b-21: 'phags dang mtshams med byed pa dag //
T07TD4089E:8b-22: yang dag log pa nyid du nges //
T07TD4089E:8b-23: de la snod kyi 'jig rten gyi //
T07TD4089E:8b-25: rlung gi dkyil 'khor rngams su ni //
T07TD4089E:8b-26: sa ya drug 'bum grangs med do //
T07TD4089E:8b-27: chu rngams 'bum phrag bcu gcig dang //
T07TD4089E:8b-28: stong phrag dag ni nyi shu'o //
T07TD4089E:8b-29: phyis ni rngams su 'bum phrag brgyad //
T07TD4089E:8b-30: lhag ma dag ni gser du 'gyur //
T07TD4089E:8b-31: chu dang gser gyi dkyil 'khor gyi //
T07TD4089E:8b-32: thad kar 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang //
T07TD4089E:8b-33: stong phrag gsum dang brgya phrag ni //
T07TD4089E:8b-34: phyed dang lnga rnams kho na'o //
T07TD4089E:8b-35: khor yug tu ni sum 'gyur ro //
T07TD4089E:8b-36: de la lhun po gnya' shing 'dzin //
T07TD4089E:8b-37: gshol mda' 'dzin dang seng ldeng can //
T07TD4089E:8b-38: de bzhin blta na sdug ri dang //
T07TD4089E:8b-39: rta rna dang ni rnam 'dud dang //
T07TD4089E:8b-40: mu khyud 'dzin ri'o de nas ni //
T07TD4089E:8b-41: gling rnams yin no de dag gi //
T07TD4089E:8b-42: phyi rol na ni khor yug ste //
T07TD4089E:8b-43: bdun ni gser yin de lcags so //
T07TD4089E:8b-44: lhun po rin chen bzhi'i rang bzhin //
T07TD4089E:8b-45: chu yi nang du brgyad khri dag / nub bo de bzhin steng du yang //
T07TD4089E:8b-46: dpag tshad dag ni brgyad khri'o //
T07TD4089E:8b-47: brgyad po 'phang du phyed phyed dbri //
T07TD4089E:8b-48: de dag rngams su'ang 'phang dang mnyam //
T07TD4089E:8b-49: de dag bar bdun rol mtsho yin //
T07TD4089E:8b-50: dang po stong phrag brgyad cu'o //
T07TD4089E:8b-51: de ni nang gi rgya mtsho yin //
T07TD4089E:9a-2: rol mtsho gzhan ni phyed phyed do //
T07TD4089E:9a-3: lhag ma phyi yi mtsho chen yin //
T07TD4089E:9a-4: 'bum phrag gsum dang stong phrag ni //
T07TD4089E:9a-5: nyi shu gnyis so de la ni //
T07TD4089E:9a-6: 'dzam bu'i gling ste ngos gsum la //
T07TD4089E:9a-7: stong phrag gnyis so shing rta'i dbyibs //
T07TD4089E:9a-8: gcig la dpag tshad phyed dang bzhi //
T07TD4089E:9a-11: dpag tshad sum brgya lnga bcu'o //
T07TD4089E:9a-12: ba lang spyod gling zlum po ste //
T07TD4089E:9a-13: stong phrag phyed dang brgyad yin no //
T07TD4089E:9a-14: de'i dbus stong phrag phyed dang gsum //
T07TD4089E:9a-15: sgra mi snyan brgyad gru bzhir mnyam//
T07TD4089E:9a-16: de yi bar gyi gling brgyad ni //
T07TD4089E:9a-17: lus dang lus 'phags sgra mi snyan //
T07TD4089E:9a-18: sgra mi snyan gyi zla dang ni //
T07TD4089E:9a-19: rnga yab dang ni rnga yab gzhan //
T07TD4089E:9a-20: g-yo ldan dang ni lam mchog 'gro //
T07TD4089E:9a-21: 'di nas byang du ri nag po //
T07TD4089E:9a-22: dgu 'das gangs ri'o de nas ni //
T07TD4089E:9a-23: spos ngad ldang ba'i tshu rol na //
T07TD4089E:9a-24: chu zheng lnga bcu yod pa'i mtsho //
T07TD4089E:9a-26: mnar med pa'o de tsam mo //
T07TD4089E:9a-27: de yi steng na dmyal ba bdun //
T07TD4089E:9a-28: brgyad po kun las lhag bcu drug / de dag gi ni ngos bzhi na //
T07TD4089E:9a-29: me ma mur dang ro myags dang //
T07TD4089E:9a-30: spu gri'i lam sogs chu bo yin //
T07TD4089E:9a-31: chu bur can sogs grang brgyad gzhan //
T07TD4089E:9a-32: nyi zla lhun po'i phyed na'o //
T07TD4089E:9a-33: dpag tshad lnga bcu gcig dang bcas //
T07TD4089E:9a-34: nam phyed nyi ma nub pa dang //
T07TD4089E:9a-35: nyi ma phyed dang 'char dus gcig //
T07TD4089E:9a-36: dbyar gyi zla ba gnyis pa yi //
T07TD4089E:9a-37: tha ma'i tshes dgu nas mtshan ring //
T07TD4089E:9a-38: dgun rnams kyi ni bzhi pa la //
T07TD4089E:9a-39: thung ngur 'gyur ro nyin mo bzlog / nyin mtshan ring ba thang cig go //
T07TD4089E:9a-41: nyi ma dang ni nye ba las //
T07TD4089E:9a-42: rang gi grib mas 'grib par snang //
T07TD4089E:9a-43: 'di la bang rim bzhi yod de //
T07TD4089E:9a-44: bar gyi thag ni stong phrag bcu //
T07TD4089E:9a-45: stong phrag dag ni bcu drug dang //
T07TD4089E:9a-46: brgyad dang bzhi dang gnyis 'phags so //
T07TD4089E:9a-47: de la lag na gzhong thogs dang //
T07TD4089E:9a-48: phreng thogs dang ni rtag myos dang //
T07TD4089E:9a-49: rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams gnas //
T07TD4089E:9a-50: ri ni bdun po dag la yang //
T07TD4089E:9a-51: lhun po'i rtse na sum cu gsum //
T07TD4089E:9a-52: de yi ngos la brgyad khri'o //
T07TD4089E:9a-53: phyogs mtshams brtsegs pa bzhi la ni //
T07TD4089E:9b-0: lag na @9b rdo rje gnas dbus na //
T07TD4089E:9b-1: grong khyer blta na sdug ces pa //
T07TD4089E:9b-2: ngos la nyis stong lnga brgya pa //
T07TD4089E:9b-3: dpag tshad phyed dang gnyis gser gyi //
T07TD4089E:9b-4: rang bzhin gzhi bkra mnyen pa yod //
T07TD4089E:9b-5: de na rnam par rgyal byed de //
T07TD4089E:9b-6: ngos la nyis brgya lnga bcu'o //
T07TD4089E:9b-7: phyi rol shing rta sna tshogs dang //
T07TD4089E:9b-9: de dag gi ni phyogs bzhi na //
T07TD4089E:9b-10: nyi shus bcad na sa gzhi bzang //
T07TD4089E:9b-11: byang shar mtshams na yongs 'du ste //
T07TD4089E:9b-12: lho nub mtshams na chos bzang ngo //
T07TD4089E:9b-13: de steng lha rnams gzhal med khang //
T07TD4089E:9b-14: 'dod pa spyod pa drug yin no //
T07TD4089E:9b-15: gnyis gnyis 'khyud dang lag bcangs dang //
T07TD4089E:9b-16: dgod dang bltas pas 'khrig pa yin //
T07TD4089E:9b-17: byis pa lo lnga lon pa nas //
T07TD4089E:9b-18: lo bcu lon pa lta bu'i bar //
T07TD4089E:9b-19: de dag tu skye gzugs can rnams //
T07TD4089E:9b-20: kun rdzogs gos dang bcas pa nyid //
T07TD4089E:9b-21: 'dod pa skye ba gsum po ni //
T07TD4089E:9b-22: 'dod pa'i lha dang mir bcas rnams //
T07TD4089E:9b-23: bde ba skye ba gsum po ni //
T07TD4089E:9b-24: bsam gtan gsum la sa dgu yin /
T07TD4089E:9b-25: gnas nas gnas 'og ji srid pa //
T07TD4089E:9b-26: de nas de yi gong de srid //
T07TD4089E:9b-27: rdzu 'phrul gzhan rten ma gtogs pa //
T07TD4089E:9b-28: de dag gong ma mthong ba med //
T07TD4089E:9b-29: gling bzhi pa dang nyi zla dang //
T07TD4089E:9b-30: ri rab dang ni 'dod lha dang //
T07TD4089E:9b-31: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong la ni //
T07TD4089E:9b-32: stong ni spyi phud yin par 'dod //
T07TD4089E:9b-33: de stong la ni stong gnyis pa //
T07TD4089E:9b-34: bar ma'i 'jig rten khams yin no //
T07TD4089E:9b-35: de stong la ni stong gsum mo //
T07TD4089E:9b-37: 'dzam bu gling pa rnams kyi tshad //
T07TD4089E:9b-38: khru bzhi pa dang phyed dang bzhi //
T07TD4089E:9b-39: shar dang ba lang spyod dang ni //
T07TD4089E:9b-40: byang zhes bya ba nyis 'gyur bskyed //
T07TD4089E:9b-41: 'dod dang ldan pa'i lha yi lus //
T07TD4089E:9b-42: bzhi cha nas ni rgyang grags dag //
T07TD4089E:9b-43: phyed dang gnyis kyi bar du bskyed //
T07TD4089E:9b-44: gzugs can dang po dpag tshad phyed //
T07TD4089E:9b-45: de yi gong ma phyed phyed bskyed //
T07TD4089E:9b-46: 'od chung rnams kyi ltag yan chad //
T07TD4089E:9b-48: sprin med dpag tshad gsum dor ro //
T07TD4089E:9b-49: sgra mi snyan na tshe stong ste //
T07TD4089E:9b-50: gnyis na phyed phyed spangs pa'o //
T07TD4089E:9b-51: 'di na ma nges tha mar ni //
T07TD4089E:9b-52: lo bcu dang po dpag tu med //
T07TD4089E:9b-53: mi rnams kyi lo lnga bcu la //
T07TD4089E:10a-2: 'og ma dag gi nyin zhag gcig / des na tshe lo lnga brgya'o //
T07TD4089E:10a-3: gong ma gnyis ka nyis 'gyur ro //
T07TD4089E:10a-4: gzugs can nyin mtshan med tshe ni //
T07TD4089E:10a-5: rang lus gzhal ba'i bskal pa yis //
T07TD4089E:10a-6: gzugs med bskal pa stong phrag ni //
T07TD4089E:10a-7: nyi shu lhag pas lhag pa yin ;
T07TD4089E:10a-8: /'od chung nas bzung bskal chen te //
T07TD4089E:10a-9: de yi 'og ma phyed yin no //
T07TD4089E:10a-10: yang sos la sogs drug rim bzhin //
T07TD4089E:10a-11: 'dod lha'i tshe dang nyin zhag mnyam //
T07TD4089E:10a-12: des na de dag rnams kyi tshe //
T07TD4089E:10a-14: rab tu tsha phyed mnar med ni //
T07TD4089E:10a-15: bar gyi bskal pa'o dud 'gro rnams //
T07TD4089E:10a-16: mchog ring bskal pa'o yi dags rnams //
T07TD4089E:10a-17: zla ba nyin zhag gi lnga brgya //
T07TD4089E:10a-18: til sbyangs nang nas lo brgya zhing //
T07TD4089E:10a-19: til gcig phyung bas zad gyur pa //
T07TD4089E:10a-20: chu bur can gyi tshe yin te //
T07TD4089E:10a-21: gzhan gyi tshe ni nyi shus bsgyur //
T07TD4089E:10a-22: sgra mi snyan ma gtogs par 'chi ;
T07TD4089E:10a-23: / gzugs ming dus mtha' rdul yig dang //
T07TD4089E:10a-24: skad cig phra rab rdul dang ni //
T07TD4089E:10a-25: rdul phran dang ni de bzhin du //
T07TD4089E:10a-26: lcags chu ri bong lug dang glang //
T07TD4089E:10a-27: nyi zer rdul dang sro ma dang //
T07TD4089E:10a-28: de las byung dang de bzhin du //
T07TD4089E:10a-29: sor tshigs zhes bya gong bdun bsgyur //
T07TD4089E:10a-30: sor mo nyi shu bzhi la khru //
T07TD4089E:10a-31: khru bzhi la ni gzhu gang ngo /
T07TD4089E:10a-32: de dag lnga brgya rnams la ni //
T07TD4089E:10a-33: rgyang grags de la dgon par 'dod //
T07TD4089E:10a-34: de brgyad dpag tshad ces bya'o //
T07TD4089E:10a-35: skad cig ma brgya nyi shu la //
T07TD4089E:10a-36: de yi skad cig de dag kyang //
T07TD4089E:10a-37: drug cu la ni thang cig go //
T07TD4089E:10a-38: yud tsam nyin zhag zla gsum ni //
T07TD4089E:10a-39: gong nas gong du sum cu 'gyur //
T07TD4089E:10a-40: zhag mi thub dang bcas pa yi //
T07TD4089E:10a-41: zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig //
T07TD4089E:10a-42: bskal pa rnam pa mang bshad pa //
T07TD4089E:10a-43: 'jig pa'i bskal pa dmyal ba yi //
T07TD4089E:10a-44: srid pa med nas snod zad pa //
T07TD4089E:10a-45: 'chags pa dang po'i rlung nas ni //
T07TD4089E:10a-46: dmyal ba'i srid pa'i bar du'o //
T07TD4089E:10a-47: bar gyi bskal pa dpag med nas //
T07TD4089E:10a-48: tshe lo bcu pa'i bar du'o //
T07TD4089E:10a-49: de nas yar skye mar 'bri ba'i //
T07TD4089E:10a-50: bskal pa gzhan ni bco brgyad dang //
T07TD4089E:10a-51: yar skye ba ni gcig yin te //
T07TD4089E:10a-52: de dag tshe ni brgyad khri'i bar //
T07TD4089E:10b-0: bar gyi @10b bskal pa nyi shur gnas //
T07TD4089E:10b-2: zhig nas 'dug pa dag mnyam mo //
T07TD4089E:10b-3: de dag brgyad cu la bskal chen //
T07TD4089E:10b-4: de grangs med gsum la sangs rgyas //
T07TD4089E:10b-6: brgya yi bar la de dag 'byung //
T07TD4089E:10b-7: rang sangs rgyas rnams gnyis ka la //
T07TD4089E:10b-8: bse ru bskal pa brgya yi rgyus //
T07TD4089E:10b-10: stong phrag brgyad cu las mi 'phyi //
T07TD4089E:10b-11: gser dngul zangs lcags 'khor lo can //
T07TD4089E:10b-12: de dag gling gcig gling gnyis dang //
T07TD4089E:10b-13: gsum dang bzhi las mas rim bzhin //
T07TD4089E:10b-14: lhan cig gnyis min sangs rgyas bzhin //
T07TD4089E:10b-15: phas bsu rang 'gro g-yul bshams dang //
T07TD4089E:10b-16: mtshon brtsams pas rgyal gnod pa med //
T07TD4089E:10b-17: thub mtshan yul na gnas pa dang //
T07TD4089E:10b-18: gsal la rdzogs pas 'phags pa yin //
T07TD4089E:10b-19: sngar byung sems can gzugs can bzhin //
T07TD4089E:10b-20: de nas rim gyis ro la chags//
T07TD4089E:10b-21: le los sog 'jog byas nas ni //
T07TD4089E:10b-22: 'dzin bcas rnams kyis zhing dpon bstabs //
T07TD4089E:10b-23: de nas las kyi lam lhag pas //
T07TD4089E:10b-24: tshe thung lo ni bcu yin no //
T07TD4089E:10b-25: bskal pa mtshon dang nad dang ni //
T07TD4089E:10b-26: mu ge dag gis tshar phyin to //
T07TD4089E:10b-27: zhag rnams dang ni zla ba dang //
T07TD4089E:10b-28: lo bdun dag tu go rims bzhin //
T07TD4089E:10b-29: me dang chu dang rlung dag gis //
T07TD4089E:10b-30: 'jig pa dag ni yang gsum yin //
T07TD4089E:10b-31: bsam gtan gnyis sogs gsum po ni //
T07TD4089E:10b-32: de dag gi rtse go rims bzhin //
T07TD4089E:10b-33: de yi skyon dang chos mthun phyir //
T07TD4089E:10b-34: bzhi pa na med mi g-yo'i phyir //
T07TD4089E:10b-35: mi rtag de yi gzhal med khang //
T07TD4089E:10b-37: me yis bdun no chu yis gcig / de ltar chu bdun thal nas kyang //
T07TD4089E:10b-38: me yis bdun no de nas ni //
T07TD4089E:10b-39: mjug tu rlung gis 'jig pa yin //
T07TD4089E:10b-40: chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las //
T07TD4089E:10b-41: 'jig rten bstan pa zhes bya ba ste gnas gsum pa'o /
T07TD4089E:10b-43: // / las las 'jig rten sna tshogs skyes //
T07TD4089E:10b-44: de ni sems pa dang des byas //
T07TD4089E:10b-45: sems pa yid kyi las yin no //
T07TD4089E:10b-46: des bskyed lus dang ngag gi las //
T07TD4089E:10b-47: de dag rnam rig rnam rig min //
T07TD4089E:10b-48: lus rnam rig byed dbyibs su 'dod //
T07TD4089E:11a-2: skad cig ma yin 'jig phyir ro //
T07TD4089E:11a-5: gnyis gzung 'gyur te rdul la med //
T07TD4089E:11a-6: ngag rnams rig byed ni ngag sgra //
T07TD4089E:11a-7: rnam gsum dri med gzugs gsungs dang //
T07TD4089E:11a-8: 'phel dang ma byas lam sogs phyir //
T07TD4089E:11a-9: 'dod gtogs rnam rig min skad cig //
T07TD4089E:11a-11: zag bcas lus dang ngag gi las //
T07TD4089E:11a-12: rang gi 'byung ba dag rgyur byas //
T07TD4089E:11a-13: zag med gang du skyes pa'i yin //
T07TD4089E:11a-14: rnam rig byed min ma zin dang //
T07TD4089E:11a-15: rgyu mthun las byung sems can ston //
T07TD4089E:11a-16: rgyu mthun zin pa'i 'byung las skye //
T07TD4089E:11a-18: rgyas byung tha dad min las skyes //
T07TD4089E:11a-19: rnam rig min lung bstan min med //
T07TD4089E:11a-20: gzhan ni rnam gsum mi dge ni //
T07TD4089E:11a-21: 'dod na'o gzugs na'ang rnam rig min //
T07TD4089E:11a-22: rnam rig dpyod dang bcas dag na //
T07TD4089E:11a-23: 'dod pa na yang bsgribs pa med //
T07TD4089E:11a-24: gang phyir kun slong med thar pa //
T07TD4089E:11a-25: dam pa'i don du dge rtsa ba //
T07TD4089E:11a-26: ngo tsha khrel yod bdag nyid kyis //
T07TD4089E:11a-27: de dag dang ldan mtshungs ldan gyis //
T07TD4089E:11a-28: bya ba la sogs kun slong bas //
T07TD4089E:11a-29: bzlog pa mi dge don dam par//
T07TD4089E:11a-30: lung ma bstan pa bstan pa dag //
T07TD4089E:11a-31: kun slong rnam gnyis rgyu dang ni //
T07TD4089E:11a-32: de yi dus kyi slong zhes bya //
T07TD4089E:11a-33: gnyis las dang po rab 'jug byed //
T07TD4089E:11a-34: gnyis pa rjes su 'jug byed yin //
T07TD4089E:11a-35: mthong bas spang bya'i rnam shes ni //
T07TD4089E:11a-36: rab tu 'jug byed yin yid ni //
T07TD4089E:11a-37: bsgom pas spang bya gnyis ka yin //
T07TD4089E:11a-38: lnga ni rjes su 'jug byed yin //

T07TD4089E:14a-42: lung bstan min gyi dge la sogs //
T07TD4089E:14a-43: de dag gnyis dang gsum dang gsum //
T07TD4089E:14a-44: 'das pa'i thams cad bzhi yin no //
T07TD4089E:14a-45: bar ma yi ni ma 'ongs pa'ang //
T07TD4089E:14a-46: bar ma gnyis so ma skyes pa'i //
T07TD4089E:14a-48: rang gi sa pa bzhi yin no //
T07TD4089E:14a-49: gzhan gyi sa pa gsum dang gnyis //
T07TD4089E:14b-0: @14b slob pa'i slob la sogs pa gsum //
T07TD4089E:14b-1: mi slob las kyi 'bras bu ni //
T07TD4089E:14b-2: slob pa yi ni chos la sogs //
T07TD4089E:14b-3: gcig dang gsum dang gnyis yin no //
T07TD4089E:14b-4: de las gzhan pa'i 'bras bu ni //
T07TD4089E:14b-5: slob sogs gnyis dang gnyis dang lnga //
T07TD4089E:14b-6: mthong bas spang bya'i de la sogs //
T07TD4089E:14b-7: gsum dang bzhi dang gcig yin no //
T07TD4089E:14b-8: bsgom pas spang bar bya las kyi //
T07TD4089E:14b-9: de dag gnyis dang bzhi dang gsum //
T07TD4089E:14b-10: spang bya min pa'i de dag gcig //
T07TD4089E:14b-11: gnyis dang bzhi ste go rims bzhen //
T07TD4089E:14b-12: rigs min bskyed pa nyon mongs can //
T07TD4089E:14b-13: kha cig cho ga nyams pa'ang zhe'o //
T07TD4089E:14b-14: gcig gis skye ba gcig 'phen to //
T07TD4089E:14b-15: yongs rdzogs byed pa du ma yin /
T07TD4089E:14b-16: sems med snyoms par 'jug pa dag //
T07TD4089E:14b-17: 'phen byed ma yin thob pa'ang min //
T07TD4089E:14b-18: mtshams med pa yi las rnams dang //
T07TD4089E:14b-19: nyon mongs shas chen ngan 'gro dang //
T07TD4089E:14b-20: 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang //
T07TD4089E:14b-21: sgra mi snyan sgrib gsum du 'dod //
T07TD4089E:14b-22: mtshams med gling gsum dag na yod //
T07TD4089E:14b-23: za ma sogs la mi 'dod do //
T07TD4089E:14b-24: phan dang ngo tsha chung ba'i phyir //
T07TD4089E:14b-25: lhag ma 'gro ba lnga dag na //
T07TD4089E:14b-27: rang bzhin ldan pa ma yin chos //
T07TD4089E:14b-28: nyon mongs can min lung bstan min //
T07TD4089E:14b-29: de dag dge 'dun yang dag ldan //
T07TD4089E:14b-30: de yi kha na ma tho rdzun //
T07TD4089E:14b-31: de dang 'byed po yang dag ldan //
T07TD4089E:14b-32: bskal par mnar med par smin 'gyur //
T07TD4089E:14b-33: lhag pas gnod pa lhag par 'gyur //
T07TD4089E:14b-34: dge slong lta spyad tshul ldan pas //
T07TD4089E:14b-35: 'byed do gzhan du'o byis pa rnams /
T07TD4089E:14b-36: ston dang lam gzhan la bzod pa //
T07TD4089E:14b-37: bye ba'o de ni mi gnas so //
T07TD4089E:14b-39: 'dzam bu'i gling na'o dgu sogs kyi //
T07TD4089E:14b-40: las kyi dbyen ni gling gsum na //
T07TD4089E:14b-41: de ni brgyad dag yan chad kyis //
T07TD4089E:14b-42: dang po mtha' skyon zung gcig gi //
T07TD4089E:14b-43: snga rol thub pa nongs pa dang //
T07TD4089E:14b-44: mtshams ma bcad pa dag tu yang //
T07TD4089E:14b-46: phan 'dogs pa dang yon tan zhing //
T07TD4089E:14b-47: spangs dang med par byas phyir ro //
T07TD4089E:14b-48: mtshan ni gzhan du gyur kyang 'gyur //
T07TD4089E:14b-49: gang gi zla mtshan las byung ma //
T07TD4089E:15a-0: sangs rgyas brdeg par sems la @15a * //
T07TD4089E:15a-2: bsnun 'og sgra bcom pa la min //
T07TD4089E:15a-3: mtshams med sbyor ba byas pa la //
T07TD4089E:15a-5: dge 'dun dbye phyir rdzun smra ba //
T07TD4089E:15a-6: kha na ma tho rab cher 'dod //
T07TD4089E:15a-7: 'jig rten pa yi dge ba la //
T07TD4089E:15a-8: srid rtse'i sems pa 'bras rab che//
T07TD4089E:15a-9: ma dgra bcom ma sun byas dang //
T07TD4089E:15a-10: byang chub sems dpa' nges gnas dang //
T07TD4089E:15a-11: slob pa gsod dang dge 'dun gyi //
T07TD4089E:15a-13: mtshams med pa dang cha 'dra ste //
T07TD4089E:15a-14: lnga pa mchod rten 'jig pa yin //
T07TD4089E:15a-15: bzod dang phyir mi 'ong dgra bcom //
T07TD4089E:15a-16: 'thob la las gegs shin tu byed //
T07TD4089E:15a-17: gang nas byang chub sems dpa' yin //
T07TD4089E:15a-18: gang nas mtshan gyi las byed pa //
T07TD4089E:15a-19: bde 'gro rigs mthor skye dbang tshang //
T07TD4089E:15a-20: phor 'gyur tshe rabs dran mi ldog //
T07TD4089E:15a-21: de ni 'dzam gling pho gyur nyid //
T07TD4089E:15a-22: mngon sum sangs rgyas la sems pa //
T07TD4089E:15a-23: bsams pa las byung bskal pa brgya //
T07TD4089E:15a-24: lus pa dag tu 'phen par byed //
T07TD4089E:15a-25: re re'ang bsod nams brgya las skye //
T07TD4089E:15a-26: rnam gzigs mar me rin chen gtsug //
T07TD4089E:15a-27: grangs med gsum gyi tha mar byung //
T07TD4089E:15a-28: dang po sh'akya thub pa yin //
T07TD4089E:15a-29: kun la thams cad snying rje yis //
T07TD4089E:15a-30: sbyin par byed pas sbyin pa rdzogs //
T07TD4089E:15a-31: chags bcas yan lag bcad kyang ni //
T07TD4089E:15a-32: mi 'khrugs bzod dang tshul khrims kyi //
T07TD4089E:15a-33: skar rgyal bstod pas brtson 'grus kyi //
T07TD4089E:15a-34: de ma thag la ting 'dzin blo'i //
T07TD4089E:15a-35: gsum po bsod nams bya ba dang //
T07TD4089E:15a-36: de'i gzhi dper na las lam bzhin //
T07TD4089E:15a-37: gang gis sbyin byed de sbyin pa //
T07TD4089E:15a-38: mchod dang phan gdags 'dod pa yis //
T07TD4089E:15a-39: lus dang ngag las slong dang bcas //
T07TD4089E:15a-40: de 'bras longs spyod chen po can //
T07TD4089E:15a-41: bdag gzhan don phyir gnyis don phyir //
T07TD4089E:15a-42: gnyis ka'i don du min phyir sbyin //
T07TD4089E:15a-43: de yi khyad par sbyin bdag dang //
T07TD4089E:15a-44: dngos dang zhing gi khyad pa las //
T07TD4089E:15a-45: sbyin bdag khyad 'phags dad sogs kyis //
T07TD4089E:15a-46: gus la sogs pas sbyin par byed //
T07TD4089E:15a-47: de phyir bkur sti rgya chen dang //
T07TD4089E:15a-48: dus dang bar chad med par rnyed //
T07TD4089E:15a-49: kha dog la sogs phun sum dngos //
T07TD4089E:15a-50: de las gzugs bzang grags ldan dang //
T07TD4089E:15b-0: dga' @15b dang shin tu gzhon sha dang //
T07TD4089E:15b-1: dus su reg na bde lus 'gyur //
T07TD4089E:15b-3: yon tan rnams kyis zhing khyad 'phags //
T07TD4089E:15b-4: mchog ni grol bas grol ba'am //
T07TD4089E:15b-5: byang chub sems dpa' yis brgyad pa //
T07TD4089E:15b-6: 'phags pa min yang pha ma dang //
T07TD4089E:15b-7: nad pa dang ni chos smra dang //
T07TD4089E:15b-8: skye mtha'i byang chub sems dpa' la //
T07TD4089E:15b-9: yon ni gzhal du med pa yin //
T07TD4089E:15b-10: mjug dang zhing dang gzhi dang ni //
T07TD4089E:15b-11: sbyor dang sems pa bsam pa ste //
T07TD4089E:15b-12: de dag chung dang che ba las //
T07TD4089E:15b-13: las kyang chung dang che ba nyid //
T07TD4089E:15b-14: bsams bzhin pa dang rdzogs pa dang //
T07TD4089E:15b-15: mi 'gyod gnyen po med pa dang //
T07TD4089E:15b-16: 'khor dang rnam par smin pa las //
T07TD4089E:15b-17: bsags pa'i las shes bya ba yin //
T07TD4089E:15b-18: mchod rten la btang rgyus byung ba'i //
T07TD4089E:15b-19: bsod nams len med byams sogs bzhin //
T07TD4089E:15b-22: 'chal pa'i tshul khrims mi dge'i gzugs //
T07TD4089E:15b-23: de spong tshul khrims rnam gnyis so //
T07TD4089E:15b-24: sangs rgyas kyis ni bcad pa yang //
T07TD4089E:15b-25: rnam dag yon tan bzhi ldan no //
T07TD4089E:15b-27: de gnyen po dang zhi la rten //
T07TD4089E:15b-28: mnyam par bzhag pa'i dge ba ni //
T07TD4089E:15b-29: bsgom pa'o sems la sgo phyir ro //
T07TD4089E:15b-30: mtho ris don du tshul khrims dang //
T07TD4089E:15b-31: 'bral ba'i don du bsgom gtso'i phyir //
T07TD4089E:15b-32: bskal par mtho ris dga' gnas phyir //
T07TD4089E:15b-33: bzhi yi tshangs pa'i bsod nams yin //
T07TD4089E:15b-34: chos sbyin nyon mongs can min pas //
T07TD4089E:15b-35: mdo sogs yang dag ji bzhin ston //
T07TD4089E:15b-36: bsod nams mya ngan 'das pa dang //
T07TD4089E:15b-37: nges 'byed cha mthun dge rnam gsum //
T07TD4089E:15b-38: rigs pas rab tu bcug pa'i las //
T07TD4089E:15b-39: rnam gsum kun slong bcas pa ni //
T07TD4089E:15b-40: yig 'bru brgya dang bgrang bcas pa'i //
T07TD4089E:15b-41: snyan ngag grangs ti go rims bzhin //
T07TD4089E:15b-42: bsgribs ngan kha na ma tho bcas //
T07TD4089E:15b-43: nyan mongs can chos dri med dge //
T07TD4089E:15b-44: gya nom 'dus byas dge bsten bya //
T07TD4089E:15b-45: thar pa bla na med pa yin //
T07TD4089E:15b-46: chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las //
T07TD4089E:15b-47: las bstan pa zhes bya ba ste gnas bzhi pa'o /
T07TD4089E:16a-0: // / srid pa'i rtsa ba phra rgyas @16a * //
T07TD4089E:16a-1: drug /'dod chags de bzhin khong khro dang /
T07TD4089E:16a-2: nga rgyal ma rig lta ba dang //
T07TD4089E:16a-3: the tshom yin te de drug kyang //
T07TD4089E:16a-4: 'dod chags dbye bas bdun du bshad //
T07TD4089E:16a-5: khams gnyis las skyes srid 'dod chags //
T07TD4089E:16a-6: kha ni nang du bltas phyir der //
T07TD4089E:16a-7: thar pa'i 'du shes bzlog phyir bshad //
T07TD4089E:16a-8: lta ba lnga ste 'jig tshogs dang //
T07TD4089E:16a-9: log dang mthar 'dzin lta ba dang //
T07TD4089E:16a-10: lta ba dang ni tshul khrims dang //
T07TD4089E:16a-11: brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin dang bcu //
T07TD4089E:16a-12: de dag bcu dang bdun bdun brgyad //
T07TD4089E:16a-13: lta ba gsum gnyis ma gtogs pa //
T07TD4089E:16a-14: 'dod na sdug bsngal la sogs pa ;
T07TD4089E:16a-15: / mthong bas rim bzhin spong bar byed //
T07TD4089E:16a-16: bzhi ni bsgom pas spang bya yin //
T07TD4089E:16a-17: khong khro ma gtogs de dag nyid //
T07TD4089E:16a-18: gzugs khams gzugs med de dang 'dra //
T07TD4089E:16a-19: de ltar dgu bcu brgyad du 'dod //
T07TD4089E:16a-20: srid rtse las skyes bzod pa yis //
T07TD4089E:16a-21: gzhom bya mthong bas spang bya nyid//
T07TD4089E:16a-22: lhag skyes mthong dang bsgom gnyis kyis //
T07TD4089E:16a-23: bzod pas gzhom min bsgom kho nas //
T07TD4089E:16a-24: bdag dang bdag gi rtag chad dang //
T07TD4089E:16a-25: med dang dman la mchog lta dang //
T07TD4089E:16a-26: rgyu min lam min der lta ba //
T07TD4089E:16a-27: de dag lta ba lnga yin no //
T07TD4089E:16a-28: dbang phyug sogs rgyur mngon zhen pa //
T07TD4089E:16a-29: rtag bdag phyin ci log pa yis //
T07TD4089E:16a-30: rab tu 'jug pas de phyir de //
T07TD4089E:16a-31: sdug bsngal mthong bas spang bya nyid //
T07TD4089E:16a-32: lta ba gsum las phyin ci log / bzhi tshan phyin ci log phyir dang //
T07TD4089E:16a-33: nges rtog phyir dang sgro 'dogs phyir //
T07TD4089E:16a-34: sems dang 'du shes de'i dbang gis //
T07TD4089E:16a-35: nga rgyal bdun rnam dgu gsum po ;
T07TD4089E:16a-36: / mthong dang bsgom pas zad bya ba //
T07TD4089E:16a-37: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba ni //
T07TD4089E:16a-38: gsod stsogs kun nas dkris pa'o //
T07TD4089E:16a-41: lta bas rgyas par 'gyur phyir ro //
T07TD4089E:16a-42: mi dge'i 'gyod pa'ang ma yin no //
T07TD4089E:16a-43: sdug bsngal rgyu mthong spang bya ba //
T07TD4089E:16a-44: lta dang de bzhin the tshom dang //
T07TD4089E:16a-45: gang de lhan cig ma 'dres pa'i //
T07TD4089E:16a-46: ma rig gang yin kun tu 'gro //
T07TD4089E:16a-47: de dag las dgu gong du dmigs //
T07TD4089E:16a-48: lta ba gnyis po ma gtogs so //
T07TD4089E:16a-49: de dag dang ni lhan cig gang //
T07TD4089E:16b-0: 'gog dang @16b lam mthong spang bya ba //
T07TD4089E:16b-1: log lta the tshom de dag dang //
T07TD4089E:16b-2: ldan dang 'ba' zhig ma rig dang //
T07TD4089E:16b-3: drug ni zag med spyod yul can //
T07TD4089E:16b-4: rang gi sa pa'i 'gog pa dang //
T07TD4089E:16b-5: lam ni phan tshun rgyu yin pas //
T07TD4089E:16b-6: sa drug sa dgu'i lam ni de'i //
T07TD4089E:16b-7: spyod yul can gyi yul yin no //
T07TD4089E:16b-8: 'dod chags min te spang bya'i phyir //
T07TD4089E:16b-9: gnod mi byed phyir zhe sdang min //
T07TD4089E:16b-10: zhi dang dag dang mchog gyur phyir //
T07TD4089E:16b-11: nga rgyal ma yin mchog 'dzin min //
T07TD4089E:16b-12: phra rgyas kun tu 'gro rnams ni //
T07TD4089E:16b-13: dmigs pa'i sgo nas rang gi sa //
T07TD4089E:16b-14: thams cad du ni rgyas par 'gyur //
T07TD4089E:16b-15: kun 'gro ma yin rang ris su//
T07TD4089E:16b-16: zag med gong ma'i yul can min //
T07TD4089E:16b-17: bdag gir ma byas gnyen po'i phyir //
T07TD4089E:16b-18: gang zhig gang dang mtshungs ldan pa //
T07TD4089E:16b-19: de ni der mtshungs ldan sgo nas //
T07TD4089E:16b-20: gong ma thams cad lung ma bstan //
T07TD4089E:16b-22: mthar 'dzin lhan cig ma rig pa //
T07TD4089E:16b-23: lhag ma rnams 'dir mi dge ba'o //
T07TD4089E:16b-25: rmongs rnams mi dge'i rtsa ba yin //
T07TD4089E:16b-26: lung ma bstan pa'i rtsa ba gsum //
T07TD4089E:16b-27: de ne srid dang ma rig blo //
T07TD4089E:16b-28: rnam gnyis mthor 'jug phyir de las //
T07TD4089E:16b-29: gzhan min bzhi zhes nyi 'og pa //
T07TD4089E:16b-30: de dag sred lta nga rgyal rmongs //
T07TD4089E:16b-31: bsam gtan pa gsum ma rig las //
T07TD4089E:16b-32: mgo gcig dang ni rnam phye dang //
T07TD4089E:16b-33: dri dang gzhag par lung bstan pa //
T07TD4089E:16b-35: bdag gzhan la sogs lta bu yin //
T07TD4089E:16b-37: khong khro nga rgyal dag gis ni ;
T07TD4089E:16b-38: / gang la de skyes ma spangs pa'i //
T07TD4089E:16b-39: dngos po de dang ldan pa yin /
T07TD4089E:16b-40: yid kyi de dag ma 'ongs pas //
T07TD4089E:16b-41: kun dang gzhan gyis rang dus pa //
T07TD4089E:16b-42: mi skye rnams kyis thams cad dang //
T07TD4089E:16b-43: lhag ma kun gyis kun dang ldan //
T07TD4089E:16b-44: dus rnams kun tu yod gsungs phyir //
T07TD4089E:16b-45: gnyis phyir yul yod phyir 'bras phyir //
T07TD4089E:16b-46: de yod smra ba'i phyir thams cad //
T07TD4089E:16b-47: yod par smra bar 'dod de dag / rnam bzhi dngos dang mtshan nyid dang //
T07TD4089E:16b-48: gnas skabs gzhan gzhan 'gyur zhes bya /
T07TD4089E:16b-49: gsum pa bzang ste bya ba yis //
T07TD4089E:16b-50: dus rnams rnam gzhag gegs su byed //
T07TD4089E:17a-2: dus su mi rung de bzhin du //
T07TD4089E:17a-3: yod na ci phyir ma skyes zhig / chos nyid dag ni zab pa yin //
T07TD4089E:17a-4: sdug bsngal mthong spang bya spangs kyang //
T07TD4089E:17a-5: kun 'gro lhag ma rnams kyis ldan //
T07TD4089E:17a-6: dang po'i rnam pa spangs kyang de'i //
T07TD4089E:17a-7: yul can dri ma lhag rnams kyis ;
T07TD4089E:17a-8: / sdug bsngal rgyu mthong goms pa yis //
T07TD4089E:17a-9: spang bya 'dod khams las skyes pa //
T07TD4089E:17a-10: rang gi gsum dang gzugs gtogs gcig / dri med rnam shes spyod yul lo //
T07TD4089E:17a-11: gzugs khams las skyes rang gi dang //
T07TD4089E:17a-12: 'og gsum gong gcig dri med kyi'ang //
T07TD4089E:17a-13: gzugs med las skyes khams gsum gtogs //
T07TD4089E:17a-14: gsum dang zag med spyod yul lo //
T07TD4089E:17a-15: 'gog dang lam mthong spang bya kun //
T07TD4089E:17a-16: rang gis glags pa'i spyod yul lo //
T07TD4089E:17a-17: zag med khams gsum mtha' gsum dang //
T07TD4089E:17a-18: zag pa med pa'i spyod yul lo //
T07TD4089E:17a-19: nyon mongs phra rgyas bcas rnam gnyis ;
T07TD4089E:17a-20: / nyon mongs can min rgyas 'gyur gyis //
T07TD4089E:17a-21: rmongs las the tshom de nas ni //
T07TD4089E:17a-22: log lta de nas 'jig tshogs lta //
T07TD4089E:17a-23: de nas mthar 'dzin de nas ni //
T07TD4089E:17a-24: tshul khrims mchog 'dzin de nas lta //
T07TD4089E:17a-25: rang gi lta la nga rgyal chags //
T07TD4089E:17a-26: gzhan la zhe sdang de ltar rim //
T07TD4089E:17a-27: phra rgyas spangs pa ma yin dang //
T07TD4089E:17a-28: yul ni nye bar gnas pa dang //
T07TD4089E:17a-29: tshul bzhin ma yin yid byed las //
T07TD4089E:17a-30: nyon mongs rgyu ni tshang ba yin //
T07TD4089E:17a-31: 'dod na gti mug ma gtogs pa'i //
T07TD4089E:17a-32: nyon mongs kun nas dkris bcas zag / gzugs dang gzugs ni med pa na //
T07TD4089E:17a-33: phra rgyas kho na srid pa'i zag / de lung ma bstan kha nang bltas //
T07TD4089E:17a-34: mnyam gzhag sa pa'i phyir gcig byas //
T07TD4089E:17a-35: rtsa ba ma rig yin pas na //
T07TD4089E:17a-36: logs shig tu ni zag par bstan //
T07TD4089E:17a-37: chu bo sbyor ba'ang de bzhin du //
T07TD4089E:17a-38: lha rnams gsal phyir logs shig bstan //
T07TD4089E:17a-39: zag par ma yin grogs med rnams //
T07TD4089E:17a-40: 'jog pa'i rjes su mi mthun lo //
T07TD4089E:17a-41: ji skad bshad nyid ma rig bcas //
T07TD4089E:17a-42: nyer len rnams te lta rnam gnyis //
T07TD4089E:17a-43: phye ba'i phyir ro ma rig pa //
T07TD4089E:17a-44: 'dzin par byed pa min phyir bsres //
T07TD4089E:17a-45: gang phyir de dag phra ba dang //
T07TD4089E:17b-0: rjes @17b su 'brang bas de yi phyir //

T07TD4089E:17b-9: lta gnyis kun tu sbyor gzhan no //

T07TD4089E:23b-19: mi brtan la med gzhan dag min //
T07TD4089E:23b-20: dang po du mas gcig yin te //
T07TD4089E:23b-21: byang bar gyur nas bzlog pa'o //
T07TD4089E:23b-22: bsgoms las skyes pa lung ma bstan //
T07TD4089E:23b-23: skye ba las skyes rnam gsum mo //
T07TD4089E:23b-24: rdzu 'phrul gsang sngags sman dag dang //
T07TD4089E:23b-25: las las skyes dang rnam pa lnga //
T07TD4089E:23b-26: lha yi mig dang rna ba yin //
T07TD4089E:23b-27: bsam gtan sa pa'i gzugs dang ba //
T07TD4089E:23b-28: rtag tu rten bcas ma tshang med //
T07TD4089E:23b-29: thag ring phra sogs spyod yul can //
T07TD4089E:23b-30: dgra bcom bse ru ston rnams kyis //
T07TD4089E:23b-31: stong gnyis gsum dang grangs med mthong ;
T07TD4089E:23b-32: / gzhan yang skye bas thob des ni //
T07TD4089E:23b-33: srid pa bar ma mi mthong ngo //
T07TD4089E:23b-34: sems shes de ni rnam gsum gang //
T07TD4089E:23b-35: rtog dang rig sngags kyis byas pa'ang //
T07TD4089E:23b-36: dmyal ba pas ni dang po shes //
T07TD4089E:23b-37: mi la skye bas thob pa med //
T07TD4089E:23b-38: chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las /
T07TD4089E:23b-39: ye shes bstan pa zhes bya ba ste gnas bdun pa'o /
T07TD4089E:23b-41: // / bsam gtan dag ni rnam gnyis bzhi //
T07TD4089E:23b-42: der skye ba dag rab tu bshad //
T07TD4089E:23b-43: snyoms 'jug dge ba rtse gcig pa //
T07TD4089E:23b-44: rjes 'brang bcas na phung po lnga //
T07TD4089E:23b-45: dpyod dang dga' dang bde dang ldan //
T07TD4089E:23b-46: yan lag snga snga spangs pa yi //
T07TD4089E:23b-47: de bzhin gzugs med phung po bzhi //
T07TD4089E:23b-48: 'og ma'i sa las dben las skyes //
T07TD4089E:23b-49: nyer bsdogs gsum dang bcas par ni //
T07TD4089E:23b-50: gzugs kyi 'du shes bshig ces bya //
T07TD4089E:23b-51: gzugs med pa na gzugs med do //
T07TD4089E:23b-52: gzugs ni sems las skye bar 'gyur //
T07TD4089E:23b-53: rnam shes mtha' yas mkha' mtha' yas //
T07TD4089E:23b-54: ci yang med ces bya de ltar //
T07TD4089E:24a-2: 'du shes med pa'ang ma yin no //
T07TD4089E:24a-3: de ltar snyoms 'jug dngos gzhi'i rdzas //
T07TD4089E:24a-4: rnam pa brgyad bdun rnam pa gsum //
T07TD4089E:24a-5: ro myang ldan dang dag pa dang //
T07TD4089E:24a-6: zag med brgyad pa rnam pa gnyis //
T07TD4089E:24a-7: ro myang mtshungs ldan sred bcas so //
T07TD4089E:24a-8: 'jig rten pa yi dge ba ni //
T07TD4089E:24a-9: dag pa de ni des myang bya //
T07TD4089E:24a-11: dang po la lnga rtog dpyod dang //
T07TD4089E:24a-12: dga' dang bde dang ting 'dzin rnams //
T07TD4089E:24a-13: gnyis pa la ni yan lag bzhi //
T07TD4089E:24a-14: rab dang dang ni dga' la sogs //
T07TD4089E:24a-15: gsum pa la lnga btang snyoms dang //
T07TD4089E:24a-16: dran dang shes bzhin bde dang gnas //
T07TD4089E:24a-17: mtha' na bzhi dran btang snyoms dang ;
T07TD4089E:24a-18: / bde min sdug min ting 'dzin rnams //
T07TD4089E:24a-19: rdzas su bcu gcig dang po na //
T07TD4089E:24a-20: shin tu sbyangs pa bde ba yin //
T07TD4089E:24a-21: rab tu dang ba dad pa yin //
T07TD4089E:24a-22: lung rnam gnyis phyir dga' yid bde //
T07TD4089E:24a-23: nyon mongs can la dga' bde dang //
T07TD4089E:24a-24: rab dang shes bzhin dran pa dang //
T07TD4089E:24a-25: btang snyoms dran pa dag pa med //
T07TD4089E:24a-26: kha cig shin tu sbyangs btang snyoms //
T07TD4089E:24a-27: skyon brgyad las ni grol ba'i phyir //
T07TD4089E:24a-28: bzhi pa g-yo ba med pa yin //
T07TD4089E:24a-29: rtog dang dpyod dang dbugs dag dang //
T07TD4089E:24a-30: bde ba la sogs bzhi yin no //
T07TD4089E:24a-31: skye ba'i bsam gtan dag na ni //
T07TD4089E:24a-32: yid bde bde dang btang snyoms dang //
T07TD4089E:24a-33: btang snyoms yid bde bde ba dang //
T07TD4089E:24a-34: btang snyoms btang snyoms tshor ba yod //
T07TD4089E:24a-35: gnyis pa sogs na lus mig dang //
T07TD4089E:24a-36: rna ba'i rnam shes rnam rig slong //
T07TD4089E:24a-37: gang yin de ni dang por gtogs //
T07TD4089E:24a-38: de lung ma bstan nyon mongs min //
T07TD4089E:24a-39: de dang mi ldan 'dod chags bral //
T07TD4089E:24a-40: skye ba las ni dag pa 'thob //
T07TD4089E:24a-41: zag med 'dod chags bral ba yis //
T07TD4089E:24a-42: nyon mongs can nyams skye ba yis ;
T07TD4089E:24a-43: / zag pa med pa'i mjug thogs su //
T07TD4089E:24a-44: ltag 'og gsum pa'i bar dge ba //
T07TD4089E:24a-45: skye'o dag pa las de bzhin //
T07TD4089E:24a-46: rang gi sa pa'i nyon mongs kyang //
T07TD4089E:24a-47: nyon mongs can las rang dag dang //
T07TD4089E:24a-48: nyon mongs 'og ma'i dag gcig kyang //
T07TD4089E:24a-50: nyon mongs can las gong ma min //
T07TD4089E:24a-51: dag pa nyams pa'i cha mthun sogs //
T07TD4089E:24a-52: rnam bzhi de ni go rims bzhin //
T07TD4089E:24a-53: nyon mongs skye dang rang sa dang //
T07TD4089E:24a-54: gong dang zag med rjes mthun pa //
T07TD4089E:24a-55: nyams cha mthun sogs mjug thogs su //
T07TD4089E:24a-56: gnyis dang gsum dang gsum dang gcig / sa brgyad rnam gnyis 'brel pa dang //
T07TD4089E:24a-57: gcig rgal song zhing 'ongs nas ni //
T07TD4089E:24b-0: rigs mi @24b mthun pa gsum par 'gro //
T07TD4089E:24b-1: thod rgal gyi ni snyoms 'jug yin //
T07TD4089E:24b-2: bsam gtan gzugs med rang dang ni //
T07TD4089E:24b-4: srid rtser 'phags pa'i ci yang med //
T07TD4089E:24b-5: mngon sum byas nas zag pa zad //
T07TD4089E:24b-6: sred bcas rang gi srid la dmigs //
T07TD4089E:24b-7: bsam gtan dge yul yod dgu yin ;
T07TD4089E:24b-8: / gzugs med dngos gzhi dge rnams kyi //
T07TD4089E:24b-9: spyod yul zag bcas 'og ma min //
T07TD4089E:24b-10: zag pa med pas nyon mongs rnams //
T07TD4089E:24b-11: spong ngo nyer bzlog dag pas kyang //
T07TD4089E:24b-12: de dag la ni nyer bzlog brgyad //
T07TD4089E:24b-13: dag pa bde min sdug bsngal min //
T07TD4089E:24b-14: dang po 'phags pa'ang kha cig gsum //
T07TD4089E:24b-15: rtog med bsam gtan khyad par can //
T07TD4089E:24b-16: rnam gsum bde min sdug bsngal min //
T07TD4089E:24b-17: de ni tshangs chen 'bras bu can //
T07TD4089E:24b-18: man chad rtog dpyod bcas pa yi //
T07TD4089E:24b-19: ting 'dzin yan chad gnyis ka med //
T07TD4089E:24b-20: mtshan med zhi ba'i rnam pa dang //
T07TD4089E:24b-21: stong nyid bdag med stong nyid du //
T07TD4089E:24b-22: 'jug pa'o smon pa med pa ni //
T07TD4089E:24b-23: de las gzhan bden rnam pa dang /
T07TD4089E:24b-24: dag dang dri ma med de dag / dri med rnam thar sgo gsum mo //
T07TD4089E:24b-25: stong nyid stong nyid ces la sogs //
T07TD4089E:24b-26: gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin gsum mo //
T07TD4089E:24b-27: gnyis ni stong dang mi rtag par //
T07TD4089E:24b-28: mi slob pa'i la dmigs pa yin //
T07TD4089E:24b-29: mtshan ma med pa mtshan med ni //
T07TD4089E:24b-30: zhi bar ma brtags zad pa la //
T07TD4089E:24b-31: zag bcas mi nang mi g-yo la ;
T07TD4089E:24b-32: / nyer bsdogs bdun ni ma gtogs so //
T07TD4089E:24b-33: dge ba'i bsam gtan dang po ni //
T07TD4089E:24b-36: sbyor ba las byung blo dbyer 'gyur //
T07TD4089E:24b-37: rdo rje lta bu'i bsam gtan mtha'i //
T07TD4089E:24b-38: gang yin de zag zad 'gyur bsgom //
T07TD4089E:24b-39: tshad med pa ni bzhi yin no ;
T07TD4089E:24b-40: / gnod sems la sogs gnyen po'i phyir //
T07TD4089E:24b-41: zhe sdang med byams snying rje yang //
T07TD4089E:24b-42: yid bde ba ni dga' ba yin //
T07TD4089E:24b-43: btang snyoms ma chags rnam pa ni //
T07TD4089E:24b-44: kye ma bder gyur sdug bsngal dang //
T07TD4089E:24b-45: dgar gyur sems can rnams snyam pa //
T07TD4089E:24b-46: spyod yul 'dod pa'i sems can rnams //
T07TD4089E:24b-47: dga' ba bsam gtan gnyis na yod //
T07TD4089E:24b-48: gzhan ni drug na kha cig lnga //
T07TD4089E:24b-49: de yis mi spong mi dag gi / nang du skyed de nges gsum ldan //
T07TD4089E:24b-50: rnam par thar brgyad dang po gnyis //
T07TD4089E:24b-51: mi sdug bsam gtan gnyis na yod //
T07TD4089E:24b-52: gsum pa mtha' na de ma chags //
T07TD4089E:24b-53: gzugs med mnyam gzhag dge rnams so //
T07TD4089E:25a-0: @25a * // phra ba phra ba'i mjug thogs su //
T07TD4089E:25a-1: rang gi dag dang 'og ma yi //
T07TD4089E:25a-2: 'phags pa'i sems kyis de las ldang //
T07TD4089E:25a-3: dang po 'dod gtogs snang yul can //
T07TD4089E:25a-4: gang dag gzugs can min de dag / spyod yul gong dang rang gi sa'i //
T07TD4089E:25a-5: sdug bsngal sogs dang rjes shes phyogs //
T07TD4089E:25a-6: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad //
T07TD4089E:25a-7: gnyis ni rnam thar dang po bzhin //
T07TD4089E:25a-8: gnyis ni gnyis pa bzhin de gzhan //
T07TD4089E:25a-9: sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa bzhin //
T07TD4089E:25a-10: zad par bcu'o brgyad ma chags //
T07TD4089E:25a-11: bsam gtan mtha' na spyod yul ni //
T07TD4089E:25a-12: 'dod pa gnyis ni gzugs med dag / spyod yul rang gi phung po bzhi //
T07TD4089E:25a-13: 'gog pa bshad zin lhag ma ni //
T07TD4089E:25a-15: gzugs med ces bya khams gsum gyi //
T07TD4089E:25a-16: rten can lhag ma mi las skye //
T07TD4089E:25a-17: khams gnyis dag tu gzugs med pa //
T07TD4089E:25a-18: rgyu dang las kyi stobs kyis skye //
T07TD4089E:25a-19: gzugs kyi khams su bsam gtan rnams //
T07TD4089E:25a-20: de dag dang chos nyid kyis kyang //
T07TD4089E:25a-21: ston pa'i dam chos rnam gnyis te //
T07TD4089E:25a-22: lung dang rtogs pa'i bdag nyid do //
T07TD4089E:25a-23: de 'dzin byed pa smra byed dang //
T07TD4089E:25a-24: sgrub par byed pa kho na yin //
T07TD4089E:25a-25: bdag gis mngon pa'i chos 'di phal cher ni //
T07TD4089E:25a-26: kha che bye brag smra ba'i tshul grub bshad //
T07TD4089E:25a-27: nyes par zin gang de 'dir bdag gis nyes //
T07TD4089E:25a-28: dam chos tshul la tshad ma thub rnams yin //
T07TD4089E:25a-29: chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las /
T07TD4089E:25a-30: snyoms par 'jug pa bstan pa zhes bya ba ste gnas brgyad pa'o /
T07TD4089E:25a-32: // / ston pa 'jig rten mig ni zum gyur cing //
T07TD4089E:25a-33: dbang gyur skye bo phal cher zad pa na //
T07TD4089E:25a-34: de nyid ma mthong rang dgar gyur pa yi //
T07TD4089E:25a-35: ngan rtog rnams kyis bstan pa 'di dkrugs so //
T07TD4089E:25a-36: rang byung rang byung bstan pa gces 'dzin rnams //
T07TD4089E:25a-37: mchog tu zhir gshegs 'gro mgon med pa na //
T07TD4089E:25a-38: 'doms med yon tan 'joms par byed pa yi //
T07TD4089E:25a-39: dri mas dga' mgur deng sang 'di na spyod //
T07TD4089E:25a-40: de ltar thub pa dag gi bstan pa ni //
T07TD4089E:25a-41: lkog mar srog phyin 'dra dang dri ma rnams //
T07TD4089E:25a-42: stobs dang ldan pa'i dus su rig nas ni //
T07TD4089E:25a-43: thar pa 'dod pa dag gis bag yod gyis [*kyis?] //
T07TD4089E:25a-44: chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa slob dpon sh'akya'i dge slong dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T07TD4089E:25a-46: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang //
